predicate.note: Frames file for 'epitomize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to be typical of or sum up

example.name: transitive
example.text: Embittered shareholders ( some of whom [*T*-2] are suing ) say [0] the chairman and his collection epitomize the excesses of speculation that [*T*-1] set off the national S&L crisis .
example.arg: the excesses of speculation that [*T*-1] set off the national S&L crisis
